meanings.definition: To tear up or rip apart
meanings.sent1: She uptears the paper to make confetti.
meanings.sent2: The dog uptears the toy in excitement.
meanings.sent3: He uptears the old shirt for a DIY project.
meanings.sent4: The storm uptears the trees in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The toddler uptears the coloring book in a tantrum.

meanings.definition: To cause to cry or shed tears
meanings.sent1: The sad movie uptears her every time.
meanings.sent2: His heartfelt speech uptears the audience.
meanings.sent3: The comedian uptears the crowd with laughter.
meanings.sent4: The touching song uptears memories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The touching story uptears emotions in all who hear it.
